connect-guardians.invite-guardians-help: Share this link with the other Guardians
connect-guardians.table-description: Guardians will be confirmed here once they confirm Federation settings.

federation-dashboard.invite-members-prompt: Share this to invite members to join the federation

gateways.label: Lightning Gateways
gateways.no-gateways-info-description: Lightning node operators can connect to your federation to provide Lightning Network interoperability. Once connected, they will appear here.

role-selector.disclaimer-text: You are using a very early version of Fedimint. Please use with caution & report issues to the Fedimint developers on Github.

leader.label: Setup Leader
leader.description: Input configuration settings that other Guardians approve. One Guardian acts as Setup Leader.

follower.label: Follower
follower.description: Once a Setup Leader sets the configurations, other Guardians choose this option to approve the settings and create the Federation.

solo.label: Solo
solo.description: Operate Fedimint as a Solo Guardian without consensus, fault tolerance, federated backups, or other resilience benefits of Fedimint. Proceed with caution, not intended for production use.

run-dkg.error-config: Failed to run distributed key generation. Federation setup must be restarted.
run-dkg.error-default: Not ready for DKG, your current status is

set-config.guardian-name-help: This name will be shown to other Guardians
set-config.admin-password-help: Use a strong password & back it up! You cannot recover this password!
set-config.join-federation-help: Ask the person who created the Federation for a link, and paste it here.
set-config.guardian-number-help: Federations require a minimum of 4 guardians. This cannot be changed later.
set-config.block-confirmations-help: How many block confirmations needed before confirming?
set-config.block-confirmations-warning: Running Fedimint with less than 6 block confirmations is extremely risky!
set-config.error-valid-min: Please input a number of at least {{min}}.
set-config.error-valid-max: Please input a number of at most {{max}}.
set-config.error-valid-min-max: Please input a number between {{min}} and {{max}}.
set-config.meta-fields-description: Additional configuration sent to fedimint clients. See <docs>documentation</docs> for more information.

set-config.title: We need to set some configurations for your Federation
set-config.title-solo: We need to set some configurations for your Solo Federation
set-config.subtitle-leader: Your Federation Followers will confirm this information on their end.
set-config.subtitle-solo: Running a Solo Federation loses many of the benefits of Fedimint. You will not have fault tolerance consensus to a guardian being offline and not be able to do federated backups. Proceed with caution, not recommended for production use or use with mainnet Bitcoin.
set-config.subtitle-follower: Your Federation Leader will be setting up main Federation details. Youâ€™ll confirm them soon.

connect-guardians.subtitle-leader: Share the link with the other Guardians to get everyone on the same page. Once all the Guardians join, youâ€™ll automatically move on to the next step.
connect-guardians.subtitle-follower: Make sure that the information here looks right, and that the Federation Guardians are correct. Click the Approve button when youâ€™re sure it looks good.

run-dkg.title: Success!
run-dkg.subtitle: All Guardians have validated federation setup details. Running some numbers...

verify-guardians.title: Verify your Guardians
verify-guardians.subtitle: Ask each Guardian for their verification code, and paste them below to check validity. Weâ€™re almost done!

setup-complete.sentence-one: All Guardiansâ€™ verification codes have been verified.

verify-guardians.error-peer-id: Unable to determine which peer you are. Please refresh and try again.
verify-guardians.verification-code-help: Share this code with other guardians
verify-guardians.table-description: Enter each Guardianâ€™s verification codes below.
verify-guardians.wait-all-guardians-verification: Waiting for all Guardians to verify their codes
verify-guardians.all-guardians-verified: All Guardians have verified their codes
